Jumbotron Template for Bootstrap

BatGen

A simple yet powerful tool for generating SQL, MyBatis files, and the supporting DAO/BO objects all at once.

Learn more »

Latest News

Don't use if you enjoy:

  • Typing getters and setters.
  • Creating dozens of SQL tables.
  • Constantly coding CRUD commands.
  • Writing DAO's and BO's over and over again.

Otherwise, try BatGen!

Just format your variables into a text file to automate these tedious tasks.

Get started »

Open Source

BatGen is free for use under MIT license.

Download BatGen on GitHub or import BatGen from the Maven Central Repository.
